resources.string: This is a text explaining what the below list is.\n\nTap here to continue
This is the image of the animal, shown inside this RecyclerView. \n\nTap on it to continue
This is the name of the animal, shown inside this RecyclerView. \n\nTap outside this pop-up to continue
This is a row inside the RecyclerView with animal image and name.\n\nTap here to continue
This is the EditText. Here you can write Animal names and add them to the RecyclerView. \n\nTap here to continue
This is the add button. You can use it to add as many animals as you want inside the RecyclerView. All you have to do to add the item is to click on that button.\n\nTap here to continue
This is a play button, placed on a Toolbar.\n\n Tap anywhere to finish
